module.title: Manage: Projects
module.log: Added hook to update project modification timestamp.
Added more filters and search query.
Fixed SQL query bug if no project is assigned, yet.
Let user create a project if none available, yet.
Add second add button in list.
Aovid removal of last project user.
Improved code syntax of controller and templates.
Use module UI:Helper:Relations for remove confirmation.
Added empty mail classes for development.
Added status in project user relation.
Extend by default project flag for users.
Add view for setting default project.
Force to set default project if none set.
module.author: Christian Würker
module.sql:
DROP TABLE IF EXISTS `<%?prefix%>projects`; CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `<%?prefix%>projects` ( `projectId` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `parentId` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL, `status` tinyint(1) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `url` varchar(200) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL, `title` varchar(100) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci NOT NULL, `description` text COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci, `createdAt` decimal(12,0) unsigned NOT NULL, `modifiedAt` decimal(12,0) unsigned DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`projectId`), KEY `parentId` (`parentId`), KEY `status` (`status`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COLLATE=utf8_unicode_ci;
DROP TABLE IF EXISTS `<%?prefix%>project_users`; CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `<%?prefix%>project_users` ( `projectUserId` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `projectId` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL, `userId` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL, `createdAt` decimal(12,0) unsigned NOT NULL, `modifiedAt` decimal(12,0) unsigned DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`projectUserId`), KEY `projectId` (`projectId`), KEY `userId` (`userId`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COLLATE=utf8_unicode_ci;
ALTER TABLE `<%?prefix%>projects` ADD `priority` TINYINT(1) UNSIGNED NOT NULL DEFAULT '3' AFTER `status` , ADD INDEX ( `priority` ) ;
ALTER TABLE `<%?prefix%>projects` ADD `creatorId` INT(11) UNSIGNED DEFAULT '0' AFTER `projectId` , ADD INDEX ( `creatorId` ) ;
ALTER TABLE `project_users` ADD `isDefault` TINYINT(1) UNSIGNED NULL DEFAULT '0' AFTER `userId`, ADD INDEX `isDefault` (`isDefault`);
DROP TABLE IF EXISTS `<%?prefix%>projects`; DROP TABLE IF EXISTS `<%?prefix%>project_users`;
